author: joyce
msg: - Add datasetDiv Id that styles the dataset display area to the correct
width/height. Scrolling is added when the dataset list gets too long.
- Set the max-width of body to the maximum width bootstrap allows for
with its grid layout. Without this things were resizing strangely when
the page width was really large.
- Change the row/span layout for the title of datasets.
